content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to retrieve information about account ACC-233. To process this:

1. Account information requests are handled by Account Agent
2. Need to confirm account number ACC-233 is valid input
3. Must follow protocol of using account_agent tool for account details
4. No financial transaction details requested - Ledger Agent not needed

Since this is a straightforward account information request, I'll use the account_agent tool with the provided account number to get owner details and creation date. Will verify the account number format matches previous patterns (ACC-XXXX) before proceeding.</thinking>
